text:
I am trying to determine if it is possible for our editors to add clickable hyperlinks into the blog comments. Our editors often reply to users’ questions by pointing them to a more detailed post elsewhere on our site, or on the web. However, currently these urls just show up in the text and are not clickable.

I see this was an issue a couple years ago, but I don’t know if it has been addressed.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Ability-to-edit-blog-comment-module/idi-p/15929>
